title: Topic 007 Question 004
body: You are building a chatbot for a travel agent. The chatbot will use the Azure OpenAI GPT 3.5 model and will be used to make travel reservations.
You need to maximize the accuracy of the responses from the chatbot.
options: Configure the model to include data from the travel agent's database.
Set the Top P parameter for the model to 0.
Set the Temperature parameter for the model to 0.
Modify the system message used by the model to specify that the answers must be accurate.
